bib.title: Wroclaw Corpus of Consumer Reviews Sentiment (WCCRS)
bib.author: Koco{\'n}, Jan and Za{\'s}ko-Zieli{\'n}ska, Monika and Mi{\l}kowski, Piotr and Janz, Arkadiusz and Piasecki, Maciej
bib.abstract: Description Wroclaw Corpus of Consumer Reviews is a corpus of Polish reviews annotated with sentiment at the level of the whole text (* text*) and at the level of sentences (* sentence*) for the following domains: hotels, medicine, products and university (reviews*). Sentences are annotated with sentiment only for hotels and medicine. Each* sentence* file contains a single sentence with a sentiment __label__z_X and each* text* file contains a single review with a sentiment __label__meta_X. Regardless a resource type, X can be
bib.publisher: Wroclaw University of Science and Technology
